Name: Mirror Chains
About the game: Introduction to the game This is a 'Beautiful Girl Fighting Match 3' game. In the game, your goal is to eliminate and defeat the enemies in each level to get rewards. Game Features With mature match-3 strategy gameplay, exquisite character CG rewards and micro-development system, you can freely mix skills and abilities.
